snippet.title: Total strangers talking about Michael Sam
snippet.description:
Total strangers talking about Michael Sam by Spencer Hall on Feb 10 2014, 12:39p
Michael Sam came out to the public on Sunday night. What followed was an avalanche of reactions by total strangers, all of whom felt deeply involved in the news.

snippet.title: Tiger Woods, Lindsey Vonn make the rounds at Muirfield
snippet.description:
Tiger Woods, Lindsey Vonn make the rounds at Muirfield by Emily Kay on Jul 15 2013, 10:17a
Tiger Woods was all smiles on Monday as he prepared for this week's British Open with girlfriend Lindsey Vonn inside the ropes.

snippet.title: What Andrew Wiggins means to Kansas, and college basketball
snippet.description:
What Andrew Wiggins means to Kansas, and college basketball by Andy Hutchins on May 14 2013, 12:54p
The most-ballyhooed college basketball prospect ever shocked the world by committing to Kansas. Here's what Andrew Wiggins will mean to the Jayhawks — and college basketball as a whole.

snippet.title: Are NFL mandated locker room cameras a step too far?
snippet.description:
Are NFL mandated locker room cameras a step too far? by Ryan Van Bibber on Apr 5 2013, 2:41p
The NFL may get more of a headache than it bargained for after requiring teams to install cameras in the locker room.
